body: Can I have tips please, I'm really bad :(
body_tagged: Can I have tips please, I'm really bad :(
title: CS GO tips

replies.body:
Don't run about spraying.
Buy nades
Go for headshots
AK>M4A1>M4A4>Famas>Galil
Never push into a site without smokes and flashes
Buy defuse kits
Walk, don't run
Never jump unless you're trying to get on top of something
Always make sure you have cover
Reload behind cover

ps I just ranked to silver 1 :)))))))

replies.body: Buy an AWP and quickscope each faggots which try to hurt you. <imo
